definition[0]: to interrupt someone or become involved in their private affairs, in an annoying and unwanted way
example[0]: Would I be intruding if I came with you?
example[1]: Employers should not intrude into the private lives of their employees.
definition[1]: to come into a place or situation, and have an unwanted effect
example[2]: It is to be hoped that TV cameras never intrude on this peaceful place.
